description: Epic to implement data residency controls and region-based routing for user data, including US/EU region scoping, data flow mapping, DPAs, and configurable region expansion.
acceptanceCriteria: Data region routing is implemented and configurable by region_id (default US/EU).
Data stays within configured regions; cross-region transfers are documented and restricted.
DPAs with cloud providers and OpenAI are captured and linked in the epic.
Region expansion is supported via config flags without code changes.
Data flow diagrams and storage location mapping are updated in docs.
